## R Markdown

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
df<-read.csv("data.csv")
clean_data<-na.omit(df)
```

```{r covid hours}
covid1 = clean_data[,c(3)]
covid2 = clean_data[,c(7)]
covid3 = clean_data[,c(10)]
covid4 = clean_data[,c(13)]

covid_list<-list(covid1, covid2, covid3, covid4)
covid_matrice<-do.call(cbind, covid_list)
covid_average<-rowMeans(covid_matrice)
covid_mean<-mean(covid_average)
centered_covid_avg<-covid_average - covid_mean
```

```{r quiz score}
quiz1 = clean_data[,c(5)]
quiz2 = clean_data[,c(8)]
quiz3 = clean_data[,c(11)]
quiz4 = clean_data[,c(14)]

quiz_list<-list(quiz1, quiz2, quiz3)
quiz_matrice<-do.call(cbind, quiz_list)
quiz_average<-rowMeans(quiz_matrice)
quiz_mean<-mean(quiz_average)
centered_quiz_avg<-quiz_average - quiz_mean
```

```{r stats hours}
sta1 = clean_data[,c(2)]
sta2 = clean_data[,c(6)]
sta3 = clean_data[,c(9)]
sta4 = clean_data[,c(12)]

sta_list<-list(sta1, sta2, sta3, sta4)
sta_matrice<-do.call(cbind, sta_list)
sta_average<-rowMeans(sta_matrice)
sta_mean<-mean(sta_average)
centered_sta_avg<-sta_average - sta_mean
```

```{r constructing final data frame}
X <- data.frame(centered_covid_avg, centered_sta_avg, centered_quiz_avg)
Y <- data.frame(quiz4)
pairs(X)
```

```{r}
n<-length(quiz4)

model1<-lm(quiz4~centered_covid_avg, data=clean_data)
p_prime1 <- length(model1$coefficients)
summary(model1)
SSres1<-deviance(model1)
AIC1<-n*log(SSres1) -n*log(n) + 2*p_prime1
print(AIC1)

model2<-lm(quiz4~centered_sta_avg, data=clean_data)
p_prime2 <- length(model2$coefficients)
summary(model2)
SSres2<-deviance(model2)
AIC2<-n*log(SSres2) -n*log(n) + 2*p_prime2
print(AIC2)

model3<-lm(quiz4~centered_quiz_avg, data=clean_data)
p_prime3 <- length(model3$coefficients)
summary(model3)
SSres3<-deviance(model3)
AIC3<-n*log(SSres3) -n*log(n) + 2*p_prime3
print(AIC3)

model4<-lm(quiz4~centered_covid_avg + centered_quiz_avg, data=clean_data)
p_prime4 <- length(model4$coefficients)
summary(model4)
SSres4<-deviance(model4)
AIC4<-n*log(SSres4) -n*log(n) + 2*p_prime4
print(AIC4)

model5<-lm(quiz4~centered_sta_avg + centered_quiz_avg, data=clean_data)
p_prime5 <- length(model5$coefficients)
summary(model5)
SSres5<-deviance(model5)
AIC5<-n*log(SSres5) -n*log(n) + 2*p_prime5
print(AIC5)

model6<-lm(quiz4~centered_sta_avg + centered_covid_avg, data=clean_data)
p_prime6 <- length(model6$coefficients)
summary(model6)
SSres6<-deviance(model6)
AIC6<-n*log(SSres6) -n*log(n) + 2*p_prime6
print(AIC6)

model7<-lm(quiz4~centered_quiz_avg + centered_covid_avg + centered_sta_avg, data=clean_data)
p_prime7 <- length(model7$coefficients)
summary(model7)
SSres7<-deviance(model7)
AIC7<-n*log(SSres7) -n*log(n) + 2*p_prime7
print(AIC7)
```
